      • startTicketsSearch

        public void startTicketsSearch(SearchParams searchParams,
                               com.squareup.okhttp.Interceptor interceptor,
                               OnTicketsSearchListener listener)
        Starts ticket search. There is one search at a time, so current search will be cancelled and OnTicketsSearchListener will be called
        Parameters:
        searchParams - params for search
        interceptor - http interceptor. Could be null
        listener - listener for search results

      • startTicketsSearch

        Parameters:

        listener - listener for search results

      • startTicketsSearch

        public void startTicketsSearch(SearchParams searchParams,
                               int searchDuration,
                               OnTicketsSearchListener listener)
        Starts ticket search. There is one search at a time, so current search will be cancelled and OnTicketsSearchListener will be called
        Parameters:
        searchParams - params for search
        searchDuration - default search duration for updating search
        listener - listener for search results

      • startTicketsSearch

        public void startTicketsSearch(SearchParams searchParams,
                               com.squareup.okhttp.Interceptor interceptor,
                               int searchDuration,
                               OnTicketsSearchListener searchListener)
        Starts ticket search. There is one search at a time, so current search will be cancelled and OnTicketsSearchListener will be called
        Parameters:
        searchParams - params for search
        interceptor - http interceptor. Could be null
        searchDuration - default search duration for updating search
        searchListener - listener for search results

      • getTicketsSearchDurationSec

        public java.lang.Integer getTicketsSearchDurationSec()
        Get approximate search duration. Default value is 30s
        Returns:
        approximate duration of current search

      • cancelTicketsSearch

        public void cancelTicketsSearch()
        Cancel tickets search. If listener not null, OnTicketsSearchListener.onCanceled() will be launched

        Get search data of last search. Could be null if no search was completed or it was cancelled

        public void startPlacesSearch(SearchByNameParams searchByNameParams,
                              OnSearchPlacesListener listener)
        Start autocomplete places search
        Parameters:
        searchByNameParams - params for search
        listener - listener for places search, if search successful return list of PlaceData

      • cancelPlacesSearch

        public void cancelPlacesSearch()
        Cancel autocomplete places search. If listener not null, OnTicketsSearchListener.onCanceled() will be called

      • startBuyProcess

        public void startBuyProcess(TicketData ticketData,
                            java.lang.String gateKey,
                            OnBuyProcessListener listener)
        Start buy process of selected ticket. If it will be successful , OnBuyProcessListener.onSuccess(ru.aviasales.core.buy.object.BuyData, String) ()} will return url to partner's website
        Parameters:
        ticketData - ticket which we want to purchase
        gateKey - agency key
        listener - listener for buy process

      • startBuyProcess

        public void startBuyProcess(BuyParams buyParams,
                            SearchParams searchParams,
                            java.lang.String gateKey,
                            OnBuyProcessListener listener)
        Start buy process of selected ticket. If it will be successful , OnBuyProcessListener.onSuccess(ru.aviasales.core.buy.object.BuyData, String) ()} will return url to partner's website
        Parameters:
        buyParams - params for buy process
        searchParams - params of last search
        gateKey - agency key
        listener - listener for buy process

      • cancelBuyProcess

        public void cancelBuyProcess()
        Cancel buy process. If listener not null, OnBuyProcessListener.onCanceled() will be launched

      • setOnBuyProcessListener

        Parameters:

      • setOnBuyProcessListener

        public void setOnBuyProcessListener(OnBuyProcessListener listener,
                                    boolean shouldResendResultIfFinished)
        Set OnBuyProcessListener for callbacks. It will replace current listener.
        Parameters:
        listener -
        shouldResendResultIfFinished- - if true - buy url will be resended to listener if buy process was finished

      • getTicketsSearchListener

        public OnTicketsSearchListener getTicketsSearchListener()

        Returns:
